>    From: "momomanjyuu2004"
> <momomanjyuu2004@...>
> Subject: Re: manga
> 
> 
> That's Kamo-san all over.
> Kamo-san already knew this Manga.^^  sasugada.... 
> 
> Did Kamo-san read this Manga, after coming to Japan?


Yup, I only knew the existence of this manga (Getsumei
Seiki) after coming to Japan ^^

 
> After coming to Japan, did you read some books of
> Shinsengumi? 


Unfortunately, not yet. Hadn't had the time (and
money!) to do so T_T

I have seen several Shinsengumi mangas, but none got
really my attention.



> Kamo-san no kotodakara iroiro yondeisou....
> "PAPUWA" toka "Gintama" toka made shitteitara
> watashi wa
> kanari odoroki masu.^^



"PAPUWA" wa kiita koto ga arimasuga, yonda koto ga
arimasen ^^;;; "Gintama" wa Jump dakara shitte imasu.
Demo yonde imasen ^^;;; Shinsengumi-ppoi chara ga deru
koto wa shitte imasu ga, sore dake desu. ^^;;;
(demo Shinsengumi kara deta chara nante Yamato datte
aru shi ne ^^;;;)


> > (seen also in Bakumatsu Fuunroku Makoto),
> 
> Oh, did you also read this? 
> Is this Manga which Koudansya published? 


Yup, it is ^^ 5 volumes, if I am not mistaken.


> In fact, I am not reading this Manga.
> Is this interesting? 


Not that much. It's interesting how the author
portrayed Serizawa-Hijikata interaction, but the art
is below average and the story isn't that appealing,
not to mention that they don't use the famous
Shinsengumi uniform ^^;;;

It really seems that it was ended because of
"uchikiri".
 

> I think that "Getsumeiseiki" has set up Kondou's
> character very 
> well. 
> Other Shinsengumi works value Hijikata and Okita and
> recognize 
> Kondou's existence small in many cases. 
> Especially Manga has many the tendencies. 



That's true enough. Kondou tends to play rather a
secondary role in most manga.


> There is assassination of Serizawa in the 5th
> volume. 


o.o I haven't seen the 5th volume yet... I have to
search for this...


> I have not seen Serizawa sadder than this Manga. 


Serizawa is a good character in this manga. Though,
the BEST Serizawa so far is still that Serizawa from
"Shinsetsu Shinsengumi", IMHO ^^;;; Mechakucha kakkoii
desu.


> The episode of Ikedaya started with the magazine
> (Young Sunday). 
> Masuya was arrested by Shinsengumi this week. 


I haven't checked this week's YS yet. I have seen only
that it was the beginning of the Ikedaya incident.
These days I was too busy checking Pluto, so... ^^;;;
btw, Pluto is a HIGHLY recommended manga, though it
has NOTHING to do with the Shinsengumi ^^;;; It's
about Astro Boy ^^;; Urasawa Naoki rules *_*


> By the way, although it got cold in Tokyo suddenly,
> how is Aizu? 


A bit cooler (about 15C). But mostly cloudy, which is
a pain. But at night, the Tsurugajo Castle is very
nice ^^


> It is better to take care about condition, since it
> will get cold 
> still from now on. 


Thanks! You too!

Serizawa Kamo
